column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Now onto the most important part... the pizza. Since we came in a large party
column2: we decided to get both the Lou (vegetarian option)
column3: and the Malnati Chicago Classic (contains meat). I definitely preferred the the Lou pizza more
column4: but both were out of this world. When you cut into the pizza
column5: it felt like cutting into a fluffy cloud. 1 slice was pretty filling
column6: but luckily we had some leftovers to enjoy for later (which I happily kept eating).
